thread.title: Lea Michele shows pert derriere during paddleboard yoga | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Lea Michele shows pert derriere during paddleboard yoga | Daily Mail Online

author: Justin Enriquez For Dailymail.Com
title: Lea Michele shows pert derriere during paddleboard yoga | Daily Mail Online
text: Tipping the scales: It seemed like the wind got the best of Lea as she started rocking back and forth Making a splash: The gust got the best of her as she began tumbling down Not as easy as it looks: The unpredictable element of the ocean proved to be quite the challenge when keeping balance Splashdown: She fell back in the water The weather looked absolutely perfect for the day of recreational fitness as it looked clear and blue as far as they eye could see. Unlike the Californian where a swim in the summer and a swim in the winter can mean two very different things, the water temperature off Maui usually only fluctuates between from lows of 77 degrees to highs of 82 degrees â€” making it perfect for swimming 365 days of the year. No doubt she is enjoying some much needed bonding time with close friends as she has been enjoying activities on the island with her gal pals. All smiles: Despite the challenges, the Scream Queens star still managed to look fantastic as she let her natural looks show with minimal make-up Squat goals: Lea floated on her knees before continuing her practice Surf's up: The Scream Queens actress cruised in the Pacific Ocean Rowed over: Lea paddled further into the water before continuing the yoga session Pristine: She looked in absolutely great shape Soaking up the sun: She got a bit of a tan as well during the stretch session Lounging: She took a breather and took in the scenery Ready to rock: Lea and friends looked excited before the activity Lea and her glam squad - make-up artist Stevi Christine as well as hairstylists Emily and Sarah Potempa - have been actively documenting the trip on social media. The actress jetted into Hawaii on Monday, the day after she attended the 2017 Hollywood Beauty Awards in LA. The former Glee star looked fantastic in an off the shoulder black sequined midi-dress for the black tie dinner and gala benefiting the MAC AIDS Fund. No sweat: She dried up in a towel after the session Summer chic: The actress and singer covered up in a romper Good spirits: She held onto flip flops and a sunhat Looking good: The beachwear was black and white with a leaf patterned design Strutting her stuff: She ran up the beach as she showed off her toned legs Cheese: Lea was joined by Emily Potempa (left), Stevi Christine (top-middle) and Sarah Potempa (right) Fantastic four: They posed for selfies by the shoreline Moving and grooving: They even danced around Gal pals: She and Stevi jumped around as they posed for a few more snaps Peace: Lea and her glam squad seemed to have a fantastic time Warm embrace: Lea and Sarah hugged as they shared a laugh Tremendous trio: Lea and her hairstylist and make-up artist pals posed for snaps together Holiday: Emily took the picture It came out well: The snap made it's way on social media Bonding time: They all made sure to document the trip on social media Fantastic four: The foursome definitely seemed to have a blast Chill vibes: They found a nice cabana to relax in We are laughing: They posed for a snap together during one of their night outings Keeping hydrated: Lea also wore a white bikini as she sipped on coconut juice Showing off: She took many selfies Flower power: She shared a snap of her patterned hoodie with matching shorts 'Heaven': She posed in an infinity pool as she enjoyed another day in paradise Share or comment on this article 106
